DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether patient identify self-management goal ( health goal ) , prior visit primary care provider , lead health behavior improvement six week .
DOC.brief_title: Study Screening Self-management Goals Short Term Behavior Change
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( > 18 year age ) Attending primary care visit Lowry Family Health Center Level One Physicians English SpanishSpeaking Exhibit sign cognitive impairment significant hearing impairment Provider recommendation enrol study
